buildCommand: cd frontend && npm ci && echo 'PWD:' $(pwd) && echo 'Listing frontend root:' && ls -la && echo 'Run build' && npm run build && echo 'Listing build:' && ls -la build || true && mkdir -p /vercel/output && cp -av build/. /vercel/output/ && echo 'Listing /vercel/output:' && ls -la /vercel/output || true
